Armeria 0.21.2.Final API

Server 
Package Description
com.linecorp.armeria.server
Server core.
com.linecorp.armeria.server.composition
Service composition.
com.linecorp.armeria.server.docs
Documentation service.
com.linecorp.armeria.server.http
HTTP service.
com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.file
HTTP static file service.
com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.healthcheck
Health check service for load balancers.
com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.jetty
Embedded Jetty service.
com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.tomcat
Embedded Tomcat service.
com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging
Logging and metric-collecting decorator services.
com.linecorp.armeria.server.metrics
Metrics service.
com.linecorp.armeria.server.thrift
Thrift service.
com.linecorp.armeria.server.tracing
Provides distributed tracing decorators for armeria services using Brave, a Java tracing library compatible with Zipkin.
Client 
Package Description
com.linecorp.armeria.client
Client core.
com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker
Provides a failure detection and fallback mechanism based of circuit breaker pattern.
com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker.metrics
Metrics monitoring for CircuitBreaker.
com.linecorp.armeria.client.http
Simple HTTP client.
com.linecorp.armeria.client.logging
Logging and metric-collecting decorator clients.
com.linecorp.armeria.client.pool
Asynchronous Channel pool.
com.linecorp.armeria.client.routing  
com.linecorp.armeria.client.thrift
Thrift client.
com.linecorp.armeria.client.tracing
Provides distributed tracing decorators for armeria clients using Brave, a Java tracing library compatible with Zipkin.
Common 
Package Description
com.linecorp.armeria.common
Common types.
com.linecorp.armeria.common.http
HTTP-related classes.
com.linecorp.armeria.common.logging  
com.linecorp.armeria.common.reactivestreams  
com.linecorp.armeria.common.thrift
Thrift-related utility classes.
com.linecorp.armeria.common.thrift.text
A Thrift JSON protocol that supports field names as defined in the IDL.
com.linecorp.armeria.common.util
Generic utility classes.
